channel.title: Firefox Tutorial on
channel.description: Recent content in Firefox Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with Firefox
item.description: Installation or Setup on Windows # Go to https://www.mozilla.org/firefox/new/. 1.Click on Download button. 2.An executable file will be downloaded. 3.Double click on the .exe file and click run. 4.Finish the setup. 5.Select the option of “Maintain shortcut on the desktop”.

item.title: Install older versions of firefox
item.description: How can I install an older version? # Go to https://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/ Find the list of older versions in the above link. Select the operating system you want to install in. Select the Language you want to install in. An executable will be downloaded. Run the .exe file to install the firefox version.
